review_title: Not necessarily better than field paramedicine
job_title: ED Paramedic in Rocky Mount, NC
pros: Compared to the ambulance, the hospital provides more staff assistance and a more stable environment. Plus there's AC in the summer and heat in the winter. Shift differentials and increased pay compared to county EMS systems.
cons: Was told to expect a 6:2 ratio, however there are several nights where I have been assigned 10-15 rooms or just told to "help everybody." Not many opportunities for paramedics to grow in their career here. As a new addition to the ED, paramedics have not been well accepted by many of the staff nurses. Pay has been incorrect for months, and HR has not been very helpful in correcting it.

review_title: Great place to start for new healthcare workers
job_title: EKG Technician: Certified EKG Technician in Rocky Mount, NC
pros: Uniforms are given to you and they are always clean. You get to interact with different members of the care team and this serves as a nice crash course into hopistal care. The staff members are supportive and worked together. There were always supplies stocked and ready to go and you are able to move around from building to building.
cons: There are times when you have to rush and may not get lunch. Some of the ER doctors can be intimidating and difficult to work with, but that was all part of the challenge of working in a critical care setting. If you work third shift, then a lot of your time will be spent in the ER, which means you will have to work fast and deal with the patients at their worst. Can be very intense at times and you don't know how hectic things will get, which may leave you edgy.

pros: The people you work with is great. Its a high paced ER which is great.....you stay busy
cons: The company itself are not loyal to the employees. Pay and raises are terrible. No loyalty to those that work hard and provide excellent care.

pros: Great place to work for. Great providers and coworkers throughout the ED. Other staff are pleasant to work with as well.
cons: It is very fast paced. You have to be able to keep up.
Good old girls network. You are either in or you are not. Not very professional
